Package userInput

Class UserInput

java.lang.Object
userInput.UserInput
All Implemented Interfaces:
KeyListener, EventListener
public class UserInput extends Object implements KeyListener
This Class uses the KeyListener to listen to keyboard inputs and return the key pressed

03-20-2021
